app_description: This application is a secure financial planning platform that allows users to easily track and manage their personal debts. With features like interest application, installment options, and payment management, it gives you complete control over your debts while protecting your personal information with two-factor authentication. We offer a powerful and user-friendly solution to help you maintain your financial order!
name: Name
I_don't_have_an_account_yet: I don't have an account yet?
check_password: The password must be 8 to 12 characters long
password_reset_info: We need your email address so we can send you the password reset link.
reset_password_warning: Remember to check your spam folder or unblock softwarebkm@gmail.com ifyou can not find the message.
change_password_info: The password must be  to 12 characters long and it must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one special character, and one number
verify_user_account_message: A verification code has been sent to your email.
